Element fire; Type substance infusion; Level 4; Burn 3
Associated Blasts blue flame, fire, plasma
Saving Throw Will negates

Your kinetic blast is so bright that it blinds your foes. Whenever an infused blast hits a foe and penetrates its spell resistance, that foe must succeed at a Will save or be blinded for 1 round, regardless of whether it takes damage from the blast. You can reduce the blastâ€™s damage by half to increase the DC of this save by 2.
